ruleContent.content: function parseComments(n){ for(var c=[],e=0;e': parseComments(data.data.comments);

ruleSearch.author: author##<[^<>]+>
ruleSearch.name: title

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <(pageCount>2 ? 2 : pageCount); i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

":""; content=java.getString("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n◎作者有话说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} //获取评论开启 if(!baseUrl.match(/baidu/)){ //匹配书籍id跟章节id bid=baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]; cid=baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]; //拼接评论url url="https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+bid+"&chapterid="+cid; //获取评论列表 list=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).body; comment=""; //判断评论数量 len=list.length>15?15:list.length; for(i=0;i ##◎作者有话说：\s*感谢(在|投出|灌溉|小天使|.*扔了)*.*(小天使|老板|营养液|火箭炮|地雷|手榴弹).*|感谢(在|投出|灌溉|小天使).*?(小天使|老板|营养液).*|非常感谢.*?会继续努力.*|.*?(浅水炸弹|深水鱼雷|手榴弹|地雷|火箭炮|捉个虫|普通用户、初级).*|为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行.*|此评论超时未审，暂被系统自动屏蔽.*|Chapter\.\d+

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    latest: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      ),
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
      
    ].join(','),
    latest:
      o.updteChapterName + '▪' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, '').replace(/^vip卷\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://book.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
 Packages.java.lang,
 Packages.javax.crypto,
 Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
 Packages.java.io,
 Packages.java.util,
 Packages.java.util.zip,
);

with(javaImport){
 function decrypt(str){
 	var h=result.substring(16);
 	var u=result.substring(0,16);
 	var p=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(String(h));
 	var t=String("Shuew237HSFH242s").getBytes("UTF-8");
 var key=SecretKeySpec(t,"AES");
 var iv=IvParameterSpec(String(u).getBytes("UTF-8")); 
 var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
 chipher.init(2,key,iv);
 var m=chipher.doFinal(p);
 var arr1 = new Array(m.length+1);
 arr1.push(m);
 arr1[m.length]=0;
 var inflaterInputStream = new InflaterInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(m));
 var byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream(512);
 while (true) {
 var read = inflaterInputStream.read();
 if (read != -1) {
 byteArrayOutputStream.write(read);
 } else {
 	byteArrayOutputStream.close();
 return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
 }
 }
 }
}
decrypt(result)
</js>$.data
